description:

W ramach projektu powstanie kompleksowy system integrujący istniejące rozwiązania administracji budowlanej. Głównym założeniem jest wyeliminowanie konieczności indywidualnego kontaktu inwestora z różnymi urzędami, dzięki jednemu centralnemu interfejsowi.

Jenkins, GitLab CI).

title: Angular Developer
description:
O projekcie: Wspólnie z naszym Partnerem, wiodącym liderem w branży energetycznej w Europie, poszukujemy doświadczonej osoby na stanowisko Angular Developer. ✨Nasz Partner to skandynawska firma, specjalizująca się w rozwijaniu innowacyjnych projektów z obszaru energii odnawialnej. Realizują projekty obejmujące różnorodne obszary, takie jak stacje ładowania dla samochodów elektrycznych (aplikacja mobilna i platforma webowa), farmy wiatrowe oraz nowoczesne rozwiązania wewnętrzne.Projekt obejmuje kompleksową restrukturyzację sposobu, w jaki organizowane są komponenty interfejsu użytkownika (UI). title: Front-End Lead Engineer for Samsung Ads Project
description:
About the projectWe seek a highly skilled and motivated Front-End Lead Engineer to join our growing Samsung Ads team. As Front-End Lead Engineer, you will contribute to development and buildout of components of Samsung’s DSP platform.You will be closely working with local team in Warsaw, having also many opportunities of collaboration with Samsung’s remote teams across the globe (US, Korea, India, UK) to help implement and deploy services.Expertise you bring to the team, will play a crucial role in building modern, well performing, services which we will use to deliver targeted ads to our users. On daily basis, you will be collaborating with other professionals around design, implementation, and review of the source code, followed by delivery of proper documentation and quality.Samsung Ads is a highly successful and fast-growing business for over last six years. This business and its continued future success depend on the products, technologies, and tools owned by Samsung. Hundreds of people strong, with a substantial presence in five countries, Samsung Ads team is a dynamic and complex organization operating across a broad spectrum of product and strategic domains.Join our team and play a key role in shaping the future of our ad tech platform.Technologies in useFE•	TypeScript•	SCSS•	React•	Jest•	Cypress•	GraphQLBE•	Ruby on Rails•	AWS
Your responsibilitiesDesign and implement scalable and maintainable front-end architectures, ensuring high performance and reliability.Lead the development of responsive, user-friendly, and visually appealing complex front-end applications and components. Establish and follow best coding practices.Set and maintain high standards for code quality, code reviews, and best practices within the front-end team.Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, improve loading times, and optimize user experiences.Collaborate with product managers, UX/UI designers, back-end engineers, and data scientists to define requirements and implement effective solutions.Collaborate with peers and leaders across the various sites of Samsung Ads, driving cross-site efforts to improve Samsung Ads' capabilities.Maintain comprehensive documentation for front-end systems and processes.Ensure robust testing procedures and continuous integration to guarantee the reliability of our front-end applications.Plan and oversee development of new features. Prepare technical requirements.Being a mentor for younger developers.Prepare solutions, initiatives to improve quality and improve team performance.

description:
O projekcie: Jesteś ogarniętym Front-end developerem/ką z dobrymi manierami w e-commerce i kodowaniu? Jeśli bez mrugnięcia okiem potrafisz przenosić góry Vue.js (min. 2,5 roku expa), bardzo dobrze znasz się na CSS i nie lękasz się komunikacji w języku angielskim oraz polskim (min. B2) - śmiało czytaj dalej. Potrafisz zmierzyć i zinterpretować podstawowe metryki wydajności strony internetowej oraz umiesz korzystać z narzędzi deweloperskich przeglądarki w celu debugowania problemów? Do tego masz otwartą głowę, myślisz nieszablonowo i chcesz tworzyć soft dobrze, a nie jako tako. Brzmi znajomo? Czujesz, że to o Tobie? Może się dogadamy. Masz szansę zostać jednym z naszych Cyber Sailors!Lokalizacja: Kraków - 100% stacjonarnie lub hybrydowo (2-3x w tygodniu praca z biura)
Twój zakres obowiązków: Rozwijanie i utrzymywanie frontendu sklepu internetowego napisanego w VueOpracowywanie warstwy prezentacji / interface’u z użyciem HTML, CSS i JavaScript (Vue)Programowanie nowych funkcjonalności, modułów, rozszerzeńUtrzymywanie i rozwój istniejących projektówKomunikacja i współpraca z zespołem, partnerską agencją oraz klientem, w tym udział w spotkaniach, również po angielskuOptymalizacja projektów pod kątem Web Performance, Core Web Vitals, Usability, SEO i AccessibilityImplementacja Google Tag Managera i innych narzędzi do trackowania i monitoringuPisanie schludnego kodu i dokumentacja własnej pracy
Nasze wymagania: Jesteś doświadczonym/ną Front End Developerem (masz min. 2-3 lata doświadczenia w programowaniu komercyjnym)Masz doświadczenie z Vue.js (inne frameworki mile widziane)Wiesz jak stosować HTML, CSS (bardzo dobra znajomość) aby całość działała zgodnie z założeniami oraz znasz jeden z preprocesorów CSS (min. dobra znajomość). My pracujemy na SCSSPotrafisz zmierzyć i zinterpretować podstawowe metryki wydajności strony internetowej oraz umiesz korzystać z narzędzi deweloperskich przeglądarki w celu debugowania problemówMasz poczucie estetykiWiesz co to WCAGJesteś programistą z dobrą znajomością JavaScript (ES6+) i umiejętnością programowania (wiesz czym jest referencja, obiekt, klasa, interfejs, jak działa map/reduce)Wiesz jak pracować z asynchronicznością w JavascriptWiesz co to SOLID, DRY i KISSZnasz podstawy Node.js, wiesz co to jest Webpack i potrafisz korzystać z NPMPotrafisz utrzymać porządek w branchach Git, commitach i podążać za zdefiniowanym workflow w GitLab/JiraMasz doświadczenie w pracy przy projektach e-commerce i/lub chcesz w takich projektach pracowaćSwobodnie posługujesz się językiem angielskim i nie masz oporów przed mówieniem (kontakt z zagranicznym zespołem i partnerami wymaga codziennych rozmów w tym języku)Potrafisz pracować samodzielnie, cechujesz się odpowiedzialnością za powierzone zadania i jesteś gotowy/gotowa pracować w zespole (częściowi) zdalnymDodatkowym atutem będzie znajomość języka niemieckiego, Tailwind CSS oraz Nuxt.js

title: Angular Developer (Digital Hangar)
description:
About the projectDigital Hangar (DH) is a cooperation between Lufthansa Systems Poland (located in Gdańsk) and Lufthansa Group directly. Our teams build Applications (Frontend and Backend) exclusively for the Lufthansa Group digitalization initiatives.The DH aims to upgrade the LH Group to new digital business models, innovative product ideas and digital technologies for a digital future. As Hangar, we must research new technologies and solutions from IT market which will also be your responsibility.We are focused on the continuous development of our software engineers and therefore you can expect:•	Newest technologies to work on,•	Experienced developers to learn from,•	Weekly dev talks,•	Time for refactoring and improvements,•	Freedom to choose frameworks/libraries,•	Individual development plan with trainings.
Your responsibilitiesYou will work with the latest technologies, collaborate with experienced developers, and enjoy a supportive environment focused on continuous learning and development.
Our requirementsAt least 3 years of experience on a similar position,Strong understanding of Angular 17+ features, including components, services, modules, and routing,Expertise in TypeScript, including advanced types and interfaces.Solid knowledge of web technologies - HTTP (status codes, headers, cookies, cache), HTML5, CSS3, RestAPI,Good knowledge of Frontend frameworks (Angular reactive programming, NgRx), single page application,Experience in RWD approach,Understanding of accessibility standards and best practices to ensure the application is accessible to all users,Coding using design patterns and actively writing unit tests,Understanding of core design principles,Ability to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces by focusing on user needs and behaviors,Skills in building responsive designs that work seamlessly across different devices and screen sizes using CSS frameworks,Experience with CI/CD (Azure DevOps),Good knowledge of English and Polish in speaking and writing (C1+),Excellent verbal and written communication skills for effectively conveying technical concepts and collaborating with cross-functional teams,Confidently propose new ideas and improvements, backed by data and research,Proven ability to work effectively within a Scrum team, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and retrospectives,Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to troubleshoot and resolve issues efficiently,Ability to understand user needs and pain points to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces,Readiness to work in a hybrid model - 2 days in the office in Gdańsk.OptionalExperience with Java and Spring Framework.

title: Senior Node.js Developer
description:
O projekcie: Prowadzimy projekty zarówno wewnętrzne jak i zewnętrzne, głównie dla klientów z sektora finansowego - współpracujemy z liderami rynku finansowego: bankami, towarzystwami ubezpieczeniowymi i pośrednikami finansowymi. title: Fullstack Developer (Node.js and React)
description:
About the projectProject: AI-driven solution for the fin-tech sector.Project Overview:This project focuses on developing a disruptive SaaS platform that leverages cutting-edge AI to enhance efficiency, compliance, and productivity for financial services companies. The platform harnesses advanced natural language processing (NLP) to deliver innovative solutions, transforming the way businesses operate by automating processes and enabling enterprise-wide productivity.Key Technologies:•	Typescript, Node.js, and React•	AWS Architecture: Lambda, API Gateway, Step Functions, DynamoDB, EventBridge, SQS, SNS, S3, CloudWatch•	ElasticSearch and Postgres•	Automated Testing: Jest, Vitest•	Infrastructure as Code: Terraform, CloudFormation, Serverless Framework, SST, CDKContract: B2BSalary: up to 130 PLN/h net/B2B; or 14k PLN gross/UoPLocation: Remote within Poland

Our requirements4+ years of experience developing applications in Node.js.Experience with TypeScript.Experience with React.Experience working with AWS cloud-native services, specifically in serverless architectures.Familiarity with API integrations and best practices for building reliable APIs.Experience working with cloud-native NoSQL databases.Understanding of cloud infrastructure automation tools (e.g., Terraform, CloudFormation, Serverless Framework).Fluency in Polish and advanced level of English (B2/C1).OptionalExperience with the Mantime design library.

title: Fullstack Developer (Java, Angular)
description:
About the projectWe develop and support software platform composed of numerous modules and features to cover the entire corporate credit chain process used to serve corporate clients and large institutions. System is used worldwide in 50 countries internally by thousands of employees since 2019. We run interesting projects including programs covering Net-Zero Banking Alliance and Environment, Social & Governance.We use Scrum with monthly deployments to few worldwide production sites. System is developed by several feature teams with 5-10 members each cooperating from France, India, Poland.  New Polish tech hub started operations in 2023, launching interesting new projects. We provide good environment for technical skill development as we have talents within local and global teams who share knowledge and provide support to others.
Your responsibilitiesDevelop software as per project requirements within a multiyear defined roadmapWork with the team on shaping the software to match user expectations as best as possibleMaintain good quality solutions by focusing on the needs, software quality with good test coverage and code reviewsPerform estimation and planning and proactive status reportingBe friendly, supportive and share knowledge with other team membersHybrid work with min 1 day a week at the Warsaw office
Our requirementsExperience with our technologies at solid mid-levelsBack-end technologies: Java 8/17, Spring Boot, Swagger, IBM MQ, Feign, vavr, JUnit, Hibernate -> Oracle PL/SQL, Liquibase, MavenFront-end technologies: Angular 15, nx, micro front-end, Jest, NgRx.DevOps principles & tools - Continuous Integration & Continuous Deployment: Bitbucket, Jenkins, sonar, Kubernetes, ELKGood understanding and expertise with either front-end or back-end with basic, i.e. 1Y+ commercial experience with the “weaker side”Willingness to work as full stack, with specialization on one side and decent command of the other, we have experts to teach the gapsTeam player attitudeFluency in English

description:

description:

The project is an entirely new system implementation built using Blazor and ABP.IO frameworks, while maintaining integration with an older system developed in ASP.NET MVC. Client has a set of web applications (multi-tenant architecture).
Your responsibilitiesJoin our team as a Senior .net developer and participate in an exciting project developing applications for the insurance industry.

title: IBM Maximo Developer
description:
About the projectWe are seeking experienced IBM Maximo Developers to collaborate on impactful U.S.-based projects. If you are passionate about leveraging your Maximo expertise to deliver innovative solutions and support critical projects, we encourage you to apply. This role is perfect for professionals with a strong background in Maximo configuration, customization, and administration who are eager to translate business requirements into tailored technical solutions.Our Client is a U.S.-based company with nearly 30 years of experience in delivering IT solutions and services. They specialize in serving the government sector and a wide range of industries, including manufacturing, utilities, finance, oil & gas, and more.
Your responsibilitiesConfigure and customize IBM Maximo to align with client business processes and requirements.Translate customer requirements into technical specifications, designs, and implementations.Manage all phases of the Maximo implementation lifecycle, including testing, deployment, and post-deployment support.Develop and maintain Maximo integrations using the Maximo Integration Framework (MIF).Analyze existing workflows and identify opportunities for optimization or enhancement within Maximo.Create and execute comprehensive Maximo testing plans to ensure functionality meets client requirements.Provide training and develop documentation on Maximo features, best practices, and user processes.Troubleshoot technical issues related to Maximo or its integrations, ensuring timely resolution.Design and implement custom solutions, reports, or modules to address unique client needs.Support system upgrades, apply patches, and manage ongoing Maximo system maintenance.

title: Bioinformatician / R Shiny Developer 0,5 FTE
description:
About the projectApplications providing analyses for in vivo researchers. First app provides study-level analysis of longitudinal data (e.g., Body Weight, Tumor Volume, Response Type, Signal Intensity from Image Analysis ROIs). Second app provides meta-analysis to estimate antitumor effects across multiple studies.  For the coming year, we would like to expand the output of existing analyses as well as launch analysis of new endpoints.
Your responsibilitiesBe technically opinionated, with demonstrated adherence to best practices in software engineering including appropriate use of abstraction, testing, usability, and version control to create sustainable and reusable software.Collaboratively and pragmatically solve scientific software engineering challenges encountered at the forefront of quantifying test article effects, particularly those related to the interactive visualization.Collaborate with local and off-shore engineering teams to support your software development efforts.

title: Blockchain Developer
description:
About the projectDAC.digital, a leading software and hardware company rapidly expanding across Europe, seeks talented Blockchain Developers to join our growing team. We specialize in providing top-tier engineering teams and developing innovative products that address complex business challenges. With over 14 years of experience in R&D projects for startups, scaleups, and enterprises, we bring unparalleled technical expertise to every project we undertake.Salary:•	25 000 – 30 000 PLN net/month- pure B2B contract•	22 000 – 26 000 PLN net/month – B2B contract (days off included)
Your responsibilitiesdesigning and implementing blockchain solutions by applying your knowledge of blockchain fundamentals, including block architecture, consensus mechanisms, and token standards (ERC-20, ERC-721, ERC-1155, CW20);developing and deploying smart contracts using Solidity for Ethereum/EVM-based platforms and optionally Rust for Solana or Cosmos;conducting smart contract testing using tools such as Hardhat, Foundry, Truffle (EVM), and Anchor (Solana) to ensure robust and secure code;integrating wallets like Metamask, Phantom, and Keplr into decentralized applications (dApps), enabling smooth user interactions with blockchain networks;contributing to developing front-end dApp interfaces using JavaScript/TypeScript, React, and libraries like web3.js or ethers.js for Ethereum-based solutions;developing backend services using Node.js (optionally NestJS) and building APIs that facilitate blockchain interactions and data retrieval;supporting the creation and customization of blockchain chains with Golang, utilizing the Cosmos SDK for scalable solutions;implementing DevOps practices, including containerization with Docker and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for automated deployments and updates;collaborating with the team to optimize performance, improve security, and enhance the efficiency of blockchain-based systems.
Our requirementsblockchain fundamentals: block architecture, consensus mechanisms, and token standards (ERC-20, ERC-721, ERC-1155, CW20);smart contract development: Solidity (Ethereum/EVM) and optionally Rust (Solana, Cosmos);smart contract testing: Hardhat, Foundry, Truffle (EVM), and Anchor (Solana);wallet Integrations: integrating Metamask, Phantom, and Keplr into dApps;dApp Front-End Development: JavaScript/TypeScript, React, and web3.js or ethers.js for EVM;backend Development: Node.js (optionally NestJS) and API development for blockchain interactions;Golang Development: Golang for creating and customizing new chains using Cosmos SDK;DevOps: Docker, optionally Kubernetes and CI/CD pipelines for deployment.solid experience with block architecture, consensus mechanisms, and token standards;strong experience with Solidity;proficiency in using Hardhat, Foundry, Truffle (EVM), and Anchor (Solana);knowledge of English (min. B2);working in agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban);good communication skills;eager to learn and share knowledge;willing to travel if necessary (conferences, coworking events, etc.)Optionalinteroperability protocols: bridges (e.g., LayerZero, Wormhole) and IBC (Cosmos);Indexing and Querying solutions;node Operations: deploying and maintaining Ethereum nodes (Geth/Infura), Solana validators, and Cosmos full nodes;tokenomics implementation: the ability to design and implement token models, staking, and governance mechanisms;blockchain security: understanding vulnerabilities (e.g., reentrancy, overflow) and using tools like MythX, Slither, or Tenderly;gas optimization: techniques for minimizing transaction costs on EVM-based chains;Oracles and External Data: Integration with Chainlink, Band Protocol, and other Oracle solutions.

title: Symfony Developer (Senior)
description:
O projekcie: Jeżeli jesteś Developerem Seniorem z certem Symfony - jesteś naszym księciem z bajki (lub księżniczką!). Do tego znasz język angielski i polski na poziomie min. B2? Śmiało scrolluj dalej. Jesteś już prawie jedną nogą na naszym okręcie! 😄Lokalizacja: Kraków - 100% stacjonarnie lub hybrydowo (2-3x w tygodniu praca z biura)
Twój zakres obowiązków: Montowanie e-sklepów, w oparciu o SymfonyWspółpraca z ogarniętymi front-endowcami, mało upierdliwymi PM-ami, natchnionymi designerami, a także DevOpsami, którym nie trzeba przypominać co pół rokuPisanie testów zautomatyzowanych - jednostkowych i integracyjnych
Nasze wymagania: Przeczytaj pytania poniżej. Im więcej znasz odpowiedzi, tym lepszą pensję możesz dostać.•	Jaka jest różnica pomiędzy testami jednostkowymi a integracyjnymi?•	Po co w Symfony stosuje się podejście controller as a service?•	Do czego można wykorzystać tagi w services.yml?•	Jak umieścić klasę poza Bundlem?•	Co to jest feature branch i merge request (pull request)?•	Co to znaczy 'zrobić rebase do mastera'?•	Jak zrobić szybką poprawkę na produkcji (hotfix), jeśli używamy gita?•	Jak się tworzy validator, który sprawdzi zależności pomiędzy dwoma polami w obiekcie?•	Co zmienia setMaxAge() w Response?•	Do formularza podpinamy bezpośrednio encję. Jak zmodyfikować dane z formularza, zanim zostaną przepisane do encji?•	Mamy serwis, który zależy od innego serwisu. Jak definiuje się taką zależność?•	Jak zrobić w Symfony customową stronę błędu 404?•	Czy Sub Zero był w każdej części gry Mortal Kombat?•	Jak rozumiesz przestrzeganie zasady SRP?•	Co to za skróty: SOLID, CRUD, DRY, PSR, YAGNI, KISS?•	Czy polecenie rm katalog w bashu skasuje folder katalog, na którym wcześniej root zrobił chmod 777 katalog?•	Czy często trzeba pisać własne rozszerzenia Twig?•	Czy programista PHP powinien znać JavaScript?•	Na czym polega code review?•	Co to jest Continous Integration?•	Iloma spacjami wcinasz kod?•	Czy composer.lock się commituje?•	Jak w Symfony wykonać zapytanie w SQL?•	Jak w SQL obliczyć średnią ocen dla każdego studenta, jeśli mamy tabelkę z polami INT id_studenta, INT ocena?•	Jak wygląda wyrażenie regularne, sprawdzające poprawność adresu email?•	Jak ograniczyć edycję postu na forum tylko do jego autora lub moderatora forum?•	Co to jest Voter?•	Jeśli nie var_dump() to co?•	Jak w Symfony zrobić stronę w wielu językach?•	Na farmie są kury i koty. Razem mają 72 głowy i 200 nóg. Ile jest kur a ile kotów?•	Kolor #AA00AA lepiej prezentuje się na tle #AA0000 czy #00AAAA?Czy potrafisz odpowiedzieć na powyższe pytania po angielsku?
